cards.front: What is Newton's first law of motion?
cards.back: An object at rest stays at rest and an object in motion stays in motion unless acted upon by an external force.

cards.front: What is the speed of light in a vacuum?
cards.back: Approximately 299,792 kilometers per second (186,282 miles per second).

cards.front: What is the chemical symbol for gold?
What is the pH level of pure water?
